channel.title: blu on Keith's Diary and Other Stuff
channel.description: Recent content in blu on Keith's Diary and Other Stuff

item.title: Blu Shakedown Run
item.description: Took Blu down to Quinton Bay for a shake down run since we completed her internal build earlier in the week. {{ more }} All went well gas worked so we had tea and coffee, just a matter of being organised with the necessary gear for our travels I think it will require quite a few trips to sort everything out. Played around with the mythtv it did work, likely need a better aerial or change the tuner.

item.title: Quick Update on Blu
item.description: Not a lot posted about Blu in recent weeks / months, due mainly to being away on holiday in Canada with Garth & Helana. Now that we have been back for few weeks and Flo got her act together and we ordered a kitchen from Evodesign, which took around two weeks to arrive meaning another delay. {{ more }} The flat pack arrived last Thursday and we started to assemble it over the course of the weekend.

item.title: Blackbirds and Blu's Insulation
item.description: Finally finished the vans insulation, passenger door much easier with Flo helping, still a bit of a pig. Also fix the roof so here’s hoping. {{ more }} Having watched the Blackbird chicks quite closely for over a week now the seem to have fledged early this afternoon when I wasn’t looking. Since it is such a nice afternoon we took a spin down to Ballywalter and sat watching the world go by, while enjoying an ice cream, as we sat the mist cleared and the wind dropped a wonderful end to the day.

item.title: Hectic month and piss poor Weather
item.description: This turned out to be a totally manic month, having committed ourselves to Spain on the 13th of December and a stressful visit to Cork on the 17th, with the van not even half finished it was all hands on deck.

item.title: Lotti's New Campervan
item.description: Lotti getting to know her new Campervan
